text:
Talking Biotech Podcast 284
Combating Vaccine Hesitancy

#COVID19 ends with widespread vaccine compliance, but a formidable misinformation campaign seeks to derail public health efforts. I speak with @DrGuptaMD from @MODTwitter about #vaccine hesitancy. https://t.co/Ne9qHRkMy5 https://t.co/zCn2NhIxos
